name: Simple Hide-N-Seek!
description:
Simple Hide-N-Seek! Is a simple but unique family-friend hide & seek game. 

- 4 Maps with 5 rounds each a total of 20 rounds!

Play hide and seek now!

Use your mouse and click where to move or use your keyboards arrow keys! Use the enter button on your keyboard to respond to text and prompts! 

-UPDATE 2 INCLUDES-
-Added 2 NEW maps (10 NEW rounds!)
-Fixed some errors and problems.
-Added extra details to maps.
-Edited maps for simplicity.
